documentation.text:
@dev Creates a new RawMaterial batch contract. Requires SUPPLIER_ROLE.
 Validates inputs and intended manufacturer role.

@dev Creates a new Medicine batch contract. Requires MANUFACTURER_ROLE.
 Validates inputs, expiry date, and input raw material batches.

@dev Initiates the transfer of a batch (RawMaterial or Medicine) to a new stage.
 Requires specific roles depending on the batch type and current state.

@dev Confirms receipt of a package. Called by the receiver.
 Requires specific roles depending on the batch type and current state.

@dev Marks a Medicine batch as consumed or sold by the final customer.
 Requires CUSTOMER_ROLE.

@dev Marks a batch (RawMaterial or Medicine) as destroyed.
 Can be called by the Admin or the current owner/supplier of the batch.
@dev Grants a role. Requires caller to have the role's admin role (or be owner if admin is ADMIN_ROLE).
@dev Revokes a role. Requires caller to have the role's admin role (or be owner if admin is ADMIN_ROLE).
@dev Sets the admin role for a given role. Requires caller to be the owner.
@dev Transfers ownership. Requires caller to be the owner.
@notice Returns true if `account` has been granted `role`.
@notice Returns the admin role that controls `role`. Defaults to ADMIN_ROLE.

documentation.text:
@dev Internal function to record a transaction log entry for a batch.
 Calculates the log hash based on previous hash and current data.
@dev Internal view to get details from a RawMaterial batch contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(bytes32,uint256,address[] memory,address payable,uint256,uint256,enum Medicine.Status,address payable,address payable,address payable,uint256)

documentation.text: @dev Internal view to get details from a Medicine batch contract.

struct SupplyChainLogic.TxnLog storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text: @dev Internal view to get the transaction history for a batch.

devdoc.details: Implements core supply chain actions and state management. Inherits AccessControlWithOwner.      Designed to be called via delegatecall from SupplyChainProxy.      Initialization is handled by the inherited _initializeOwner function.

createMedicine(bytes32,uint256,address[].details: Creates a new Medicine batch contract. Requires MANUFACTURER_ROLE. Validates inputs, expiry date, and input raw material batches.

createRawMaterial(bytes32,uint256,addres.details: Creates a new RawMaterial batch contract. Requires SUPPLIER_ROLE. Validates inputs and intended manufacturer role.

finalizeMedicineBatch(address,int256,int.details: Marks a Medicine batch as consumed or sold by the final customer. Requires CUSTOMER_ROLE.

getMedicineDetails(address).details: Internal view to get details from a Medicine batch contract.

getRawMaterialDetails(address).details: Internal view to get details from a RawMaterial batch contract.

getRoleIdentifier(string).details: Gets the role identifier hash from a role name string. Reverts if the provided role name is not one of the known roles. Useful for off-chain interaction or testing.

getTransactionHistory(address).details: Internal view to get the transaction history for a batch.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants a role. Requires caller to have the role's admin role (or be owner if admin is ADMIN_ROLE).

initialize(address).details: Public initializer called ONLY ONCE by Proxy constructor via delegatecall.      Delegates *entirely* to the inherited _initializeOwner function.

params.deployer: The address to become the initial owner and admin.

initiateTransfer(address,address,address.details: Initiates the transfer of a batch (RawMaterial or Medicine) to a new stage. Requires specific roles depending on the batch type and current state.

markBatchDestroyed(address,bytes32,int25.details: Marks a batch (RawMaterial or Medicine) as destroyed. Can be called by the Admin or the current owner/supplier of the batch.

receivePackage(address,int256,int256).details: Confirms receipt of a package. Called by the receiver. Requires specific roles depending on the batch type and current state.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes a role. Requires caller to have the role's admin role (or be owner if admin is ADMIN_ROLE).

setRoleAdmin(bytes32,bytes32).details: Sets the admin role for a given role. Requires caller to be the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership. Requires caller to be the owner.

devdoc.title: SupplyChainLogic

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).notice: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. Defaults to ADMIN_ROLE.

hasRole(bytes32,address).notice: Returns true if `account` has been granted `role`.
